version_description:
* Ability to offline transfer map over the iTunes with cable
* Switch from OSM2VectorTiles to OpenMapTiles
* New faster version of vector maps
* Several bug fixes

- MapBox SDK updated to the latest version 3.5
- a new dialogue after map or data file import, to view the added content instantly
- a new View action for all maps or data in the screen "Manage layers"
- font updated to KlokanTech Noto, with improved support for Hebrew and Arabic labels
- OpenStreetMap logo as a "thank you" to all OSM contributors
- minor bug fixes, tweaks and improvements

- Update to the MapBox SDK 3.5.2
- minor bug fixes, tweaks and improvements

- MapTiler Cloud base map tiles used
- default map style updated
- MB SDK updated to version ios 4.0.2.alpha.2
- small bug fixes with file management
- small tweaks and improvements

The new generation of MapTiler Mobile app adds support for customized basemaps, which you can design with own colors & fonts and cooperates with MapTiler Cloud on data synchronization between devices.

- files with spaces in their names are no longer causing a crash
- minor bug fixes and improvements
Updated to latest mapbox native libraries and improved error reporting.
Migrated to maplibre native library and fixing error which caused raster mbtiles stored on the device were not displayed.

Improvements and bug fixes

* Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Improving application installation - ensuring user account has been created before catalogs download starts. This fixes cases when users experienced blank screen after installation.
